name: Bitku
description: A totally free simple storyteller, a comic creator, an art toy, a new way to express yourself in pixels... BITKU is all or none of the above.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Any Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Any Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Any Sound Card: Any
